sub_title: MSc International Economics and Business: International Management at Utrecht University • Honours Program: Entrepreneurship & Business Consultancy •  Fluent in English and French
summary:
International Management MSc graduate student with 3 years of progressive professional experience in international environments and business development. Seeking junior positions in consultancy, business
development, project management and business analyst where I can develop practical skill sets.

Motivated, bilingual (English/French) result-driven individual who thinks outside of the box and is more than willing to take initiatives when the opportunity presents itself. Excellent communication, leadership and teamwork skills. Socially and culturally aware. Strong interest in working in an international environment and ultimately in a multinational organization.
